parameters.name: NumOfFeatures
parameters.description: Number of features in the folder

title: IFeatureFolder.IGetFeatures
description: Gets the features in this feature folder.

parameters.name: NumOfFeatures
parameters.description: Number of features in the folder

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of features VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IFeatureFolder::GetFeatureCount
to populate NumOfFeatures.
